feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 18 Aug 2023 22:01:05
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Nvidia's H100 GPU is selling well with high profit margins.
- Luma AI has developed an iPhone app that turns videos into 3D flythroughs resembling professional drone footage.

Business:
- The US Courseware Market is projected to grow to USD 1061.45 million.
- Michael Burry, known for his bet against the stock market in "The Big Short," is being criticized by a veteran analyst as a "one-trick pony."
- Disney heiress criticizes CEO Bob Iger for prioritizing money and power.

AI:
- Google AI introduces STUDY, a socially aware-temporally causal recommender system for audiobooks in an educational setting.
- Unbabel unveils an AI project that aims to enable communication using thought alone.

Insights:
- Financial planners warn about saving too much for retirement.
- Ukrainian soldiers defend their counteroffensive strategy.
- Vlad the Impaler, the inspiration behind Dracula, may have cried tears of blood.
- Amazon's low payment rate for influencers promoting its new shopping feed is being mocked on social media.
- Rudy Giuliani complains about being prosecuted using the RICO laws he pioneered.
- Firefox 117 Beta 8 is compared to Google Chrome 116 in terms of Linux browser performance.
- Facebook is fined $100,000 per day in Norway for violating privacy rights.
- Climate tech startups are benefiting from the IRA.
- Background processing in Android with WorkManager is discussed.
- Node.js scheduled queue jobs processing with BullMQ and Redis on Heroku is explained.
- DPGA improves its online presence with a website revamp and on-demand CI/CD pipeline.
- Hurricane Hilary and the busy Atlantic Basin are highlighted as things to watch.
- The shortage of AI engineers is discussed.
- LG unveils the new 'Magnit' Micro LED Screen with Bang & Olufsen speakers.
- Smart manufacturing focuses on work instructions, metrics, and error-proofing.
- Bitcoin's price drop is attributed to SpaceX and Elon Musk.
- Americans are depleting their excess savings, according to a Fed study.
- A live stream of the Women's World Cup Final between England and Spain is available.
- A driverless car in San Francisco gets stuck in wet concrete after mistaking it for a regular road.
- VinFast's shares plummet after its market debut.
- A rare Ferrari 250 GTO is expected to be auctioned for $60 million.

Summary:
- Nvidia's H100 GPU and Luma AI's iPhone app are successful in the tech industry.
- The US Courseware Market shows potential for growth.
- Michael Burry's bet against the stock market is criticized.
- Financial planners warn about saving too much for retirement.
- Disney heiress criticizes CEO Bob Iger.
- Various topics related to AI are discussed, including Google AI's STUDY and Unbabel's thought communication project.
- Insights are provided on a range of topics, from Ukrainian soldiers' counteroffensive strategy to the value of Bitcoin dropping.
- The report concludes with a summary of the overall insights gathered.
